summary: A replacement Armour set for the Imperial Light Soldiers
descriptionHtml:
This mod is for a University Project and this is my testing phase - I would appreciate it if you could take the time after testing the mod to fill in a short feedback form for me located here - http://goo.gl/E6GvU

This is a mod which replaces the Mesh and Texture of the imperial Light armour set - all except the Body Armour (which I am finding difficult as this is my first mod and I\'m not sure how to do the rigging). 
The Mod currently replaces the on-character view of the armour but the Ground Models haven\'t been finished due to difficulties with collision. 



Thanks so much for taking the time folks!
author: Alex Maras
